metadata.title: CVE-2012-3508 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/lib/washtml.php inRoundcube Webmail 0.8.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML by using "javascript:" in an href attribute in the body ofan HTML-formatted email.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-core - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-mysql - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-pgsql - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-plugins - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-sqlite3 - 0.9.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-4').
